title: Job Vacancies at Lagos Executive Cardiovascular Clinic
content:
Lagos Executive Cardiovascular Clinic is a multidisciplinary cardiovascular and cardiac rehabilitation 24/7 facility focused on the treatment and management of cardiovascular diseases and trigger diseases using both invasive and non-invasive procedures, as well as preventive cardiology.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) People and Culture Associate

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Overview
     

            
    




	We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Human Resources Officer to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will manage the full spectrum of HR functions and play a crucial role in building and maintaining our organizational culture of excellence.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate full-cycle recruitment processes, from job posting to onboarding
	Manage employee relations and maintain personnel records with strict confidentiality
	Administer payroll and benefits in collaboration with the finance department
	Develop and implement HR policies and procedures that align with organizational goals
	Coordinate performance management processes and professional development initiatives
	Handle employee grievances and disciplinary procedures with sensitivity and fairness
	Organize and facilitate staff engagement activities and team-building initiatives
	Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations
	Support organizational development and change management initiatives
	Prepare HR reports and analytics for management decision-making


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a human resources role, preferably in healthcare
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices
	Excellent interpersonal and conflict resolution skills
	Proven ability to handle confidential information with discretion
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Proficiency in MS Office and HRIS systems
	Professional HR certification (e.g., SHRM, CIPM) is a plus


Desired Attributes:


	Detail-oriented with strong analytical abilities
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Adaptability and problem-solving mindset
	Compassionate approach to employee concerns
	Commitment to continuous improvement.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Professional development opportunities
	A collaborative and supportive work environment
	Opportunity to contribute to meaningful healthcare outcomes
	Career growth in a respected healthcare institution. 


Application Closing Date: 26th February, 2026.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: humanresources@thelecc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Notes: There are two branches out of which you can work out of: Island and Mainland

 

 

2.) Dispatch Rider

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Dispatch Rider will be responsible for the safe and timely delivery and pickup of medical supplies, laboratory samples, official documents, and other related items.
	The role requires punctuality, integrity, and strict adherence to safety and confidentiality standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Deliver and pick up documents, laboratory samples, medications, and other medical supplies promptly
	Ensure proper handling and safe transportation of sensitive medical items
	Maintain accurate delivery records and obtain necessary acknowledgments
	Adhere strictly to road safety regulations and traffic laws
	Maintain the assigned motorcycle in good working condition
	Report any delivery issues, delays, or incidents promptly
	Ensure confidentiality of patient-related information and documents
	Assist with other logistics-related duties as assigned


Qualifications & Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE/WAEC qualification
	1–3 years of experience as a dispatch rider (healthcare experience is an advantage)
	Valid rider’s license and LASDRI card (or relevant state rider permit)
	Good knowledge of local routes and road networks
	Ability to read and write clearly
	Strong sense of responsibility and reliability
	Physically fit and able to work flexible hours when required


Key Competencies:


	Punctuality and time management
	Honesty and integrity
	Professional appearance and conduct
	Good communication skills
	Attention to detail


What We Offer


	Competitive salary
	Structured work environment
	Opportunity to work within a reputable healthcare organization
	Career growth opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 26th February, 2026.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: humanresources@thelecc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Accounting Officer will be responsible for managing daily financial transactions, maintaining accurate financial records, supporting financial reporting, and ensuring compliance with regulatory and organizational policies.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records and general ledger entries
	Process accounts payable and receivable transactions
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports
	Reconcile bank statements and resolve discrepancies
	Monitor budgets and assist with financial forecasting
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and statutory remittances
	Support internal and external audits
	Manage payroll processing in collaboration with HR
	Maintain proper documentation of financial records
	Assist in implementing financial controls and policies.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related fields
	Minimum of 2 - 4 years of accounting experience (healthcare experience preferred)
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles and financial regulations
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	High level of integrity and attention to detail
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.


Key Competencies:


	Accuracy and attention to detail
	Confidentiality and professionalism
	Time management and organization
	Strong communication skills.


Application Closing Date: 28th February, 2026.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send heir CV to: humanresources@thelecc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Ad Creative Designer",
  "description": "Vitalvida -&nbsp;We provide you with an excellent eCommerce experience as our clients satisfaction matters a lot to us. We have an amazing combination of Products on our various websites that are tailored to meet your needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Ad Creative Designer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Remote or Yaba, Lagos&nbsp;(office based)
Employment Type: Full-time&nbsp;(3 month probation)
Hours: Monday to Friday

Description


	We need a designer who can produce high converting ad creatives at speed.
	This is not a role where you make one pretty graphic and wait for feedback. We need 20 ad creatives per day. That means you must know how to use AI design tools like Nana Banana, ChatGPT, and others to move fast while still producing work that looks professional and sells.
	We already have product photos and model images. Your job is to turn them into scroll stopping ad creatives that make people click, add to cart, and buy.
	If you cannot deliver 20 quality creatives in a day, do not apply.


What You Will Do


	Design 20+ ad creatives daily for Instagram and Facebook (Meta Ads)
	Create static images, carousel ads, and story format ads
	Use AI tools (Nana Banana, ChatGPT, Midjourney, etc.) to speed up production without sacrificing quality
	Work with existing product photos and model images to create ad variations
	Test different visual hooks: before/after layouts, testimonial cards, problem/solution formats, lifestyle shots with text overlays
	Study what competitors are running and create better versions
	Understand what makes an ad convert: strong hook in the first second, clear product shot, benefit driven copy overlay, clean CTA
	Resize and adapt creatives for different placements (feed, story, reels cover)
	Take feedback and produce revisions same day
	Stay current on Instagram and Facebook ad trends, formats, and best practices


You Must Have


	2+ years of graphic design experience with a focus on social media ads or performance marketing
	Proven ability to produce high volume creative work (show us your output, not just your best 3 pieces)
	Experience designing ads for Instagram and Facebook that actually ran as paid campaigns
	Strong eye for what makes an ad stop the scroll: colour contrast, bold typography, clean layouts
	Ability to use AI tools for design (Nana Banana, ChatGPT image generation, or similar). If you are not already using AI in your workflow, this role is not for you.
	Understanding of direct response advertising: your designs must sell, not just look good
	Proficiency in your tools of choice (Canva Pro, Photoshop, Figma, Illustrator, or any combination). We do not care what tool you use, we care about the output.
	You can work remotely or from our office in Yaba, Lagos. Either way, 20 creatives that convert, every day. No excuses.
	Ability to work independently without hand holding


Nice to Have:


	Experience designing ads for beauty, skincare, health, or FMCG brands
	Experience with A/B testing different ad creatives
	Video editing skills (even basic: adding text to reels, motion graphics)
	Understanding of Meta Ads Manager (knowing what ad formats perform best)
	Experience working with ecommerce brands running daily ads.


Salary
N150,000 to N200,000 / month depending on experience.

Note


	Send us your work, not your CV. We want to see real ad creatives you have designed that ran as paid campaigns. If you only have logos and flyers, this is not the right role for you.
	You provide your own power and data if remote.
	If you cannot produce 20 quality creatives in a day, do not apply.
